apiurl.description: Custom apiserver url can be specified either by apiurl attribute or KTAPI_URL environment variable. If not specified, default of <https://cloudexports.api.kentik.com> will be used

email.description: Authorization. Either email attribute or KTAPI_AUTH_EMAIL environment variable is required

token.description: Authorization. Either token attribute or KTAPI_AUTH_TOKEN  environment variable is required

api_root.description: Hostname of the Kentik deployment where the API calls related to this export should go, eg. api.kentik.com

cloud_provider.description: The cloud provider targeted by this export (aws, azure, gce, ibm)

enabled.description: Whether this task is enabled and intended to run, or disabled

flow_dest.description: Hostname of the Kentik deployment where the data generated by this export should go, eg. flow.kentik.com

id.description: The internal cloud export identifier. This is Read-only and assigned by Kentik

name.description: A short name for this export

plan_id.description: The identifier of the Kentik plan associated with this task

type.description: CLOUD_EXPORT_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Invalid or incomplete exports. CLOUD_EXPORT_TYPE_KENTIK_MANAGED: Cloud exports that are managed by Kentik. CLOUD_EXPORT_TYPE_CUSTOMER_MANAGED: Exports that are managed by Kentik customers (eg. by running an agent)

bucket.description: Source S3 bucket to fetch vpc flow logs from

delete_after_read.description: If true, attempt to delete vpc flow log chunks from S3 after they've been read

iam_role_arn.description: ARN for the IAM role to assume when fetching data or making AWS calls for this export

region.description: AWS region where this bucket resides

block.description: Properties specific to Amazon Web Services "vpc flow logs" exports

apply_bgp.description: If true, apply BGP data discovered via another device to the flow from this export

use_bgp_device_id.description: Which other device to get BGP data from

block.description: Properties specific to Google Cloud export
Properties specific to IBM Cloud exports

api_root.description: Hostname of the Kentik deployment where the API calls related to this export should go, eg. api.kentik.com

aws.description: Properties specific to Amazon Web Services "vpc flow logs" exports

cloud_provider.description: The cloud provider targeted by this export (aws, azure, gce, ibm)

enabled.description: Whether this task is enabled and intended to run, or disabled

flow_dest.description: Hostname of the Kentik deployment where the data generated by this export should go, eg. flow.kentik.com

gce.description: Properties specific to Google Cloud export

ibm.description: Properties specific to IBM Cloud exports

id.description: The internal cloud export identifier. This is Read-only and assigned by Kentik

name.description: A short name for this export

plan_id.description: The identifier of the Kentik plan associated with this task

type.description: CLOUD_EXPORT_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Invalid or incomplete exports. CLOUD_EXPORT_TYPE_KENTIK_MANAGED: Cloud exports that are managed by Kentik. CLOUD_EXPORT_TYPE_CUSTOMER_MANAGED: Exports that are managed by Kentik customers (eg. by running an agent)

block.description: DataSource representing single cloud export item
DataSource representing list of cloud exports
